name: generate_scatter_chart
description: Generate a scatter chart to show the relationship between two variables, helps discover their relationship or trends, such as, the strength of correlation, data distribution patterns.

data.description: Data for scatter chart, such as, [{ x: 10, y: 15 }].

style.description: Custom style configuration for the chart.

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.
